title: The Jungle of Peril
description: Be a part of creating the story with this quiz-tastic puzzle book! In the Jungle of Peril you must discover the fabulous treasure of Oraz. But first you have to find your way past killer ants, giant flesh-eating plants, fiery volcanoes and other terrifying dangers! There are lots of different puzzles to solve - mazes, spot-the-difference, hidden objects - and many different routes to choose so you can play these games over and again. But beware, gameplayer - only the sharp-witted will survive...
author: Patrick Burston
